name: Cleric
desc: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power
coolFeatures: Can channel the divinity of their deity
Can keep undead at bay and channel divinity
Domains include: Divine, Arcana, Death, Forge, Grave, Knowledge, Life, Light, Nature, Tempest, Trickery, and War
prompts: Why did you decide to become a cleric?
What diety and/or faith do you follow?
What domain do you belong to?
